string.name: share_data_description
string.description: Content description for how the user can share data with apps

resources.string: Sèbera is datos chi onni aplicatzione potzat lèghere o iscrìere in Connessione salude

string.name: chromium
string.description: Chromium, an essential nutrient required for sugar and fat metabolism. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: iron
string.description: Iron, a mineral that helps maintain healthy blood. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: manganese
string.description: Manganese, a micromineral found in nuts and leafy greens. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: molybdenum
string.description: Molybdenum, a mineral which activates enzymes that help break down harmful sulfites and prevent toxins from building up in the body. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: phosphorus
string.description: Phosphorus, a mineral that works with calcium to help build bones. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: potassium
string.description: Potassium, a mineral with main role in the body to help maintain normal levels of fluid inside our cells. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: protein
string.description: Protein, a macronutrient, one of the building blocks of body tissue and can also serve as a fuel source. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: selenium
string.description: Selenium, an essential trace mineral that supports many bodily processes. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: sodium
string.description: Sodium is an essential nutrient and is needed by the body in relatively small amounts. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: sugar
string.description: Sugar is the generic name for sweet-tasting, soluble carbohydrates, many of which are used in food. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: zinc
string.description: Zinc is a trace mineral necessary for almost 100 enzymes to carry out vital chemical reactions. [CHAR LIMIT=50]
